code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import"./Checkout.css";import CartProduct from"./CartProduct";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Checkout(props){const[cartProduct,setCartProduct]=useState(props.products);const[totalPrice,setTotalPrice]=useState(0);function getPrice(){let price=0;cartProduct.map(product=>price=price+parseInt(product.price));setTotalPrice(price);}useEffect(()=>{getPrice();},[cartProduct]);function removeFromCart(product){const newProducts=cartProduct.filter(pro=>pro.title!==product.title);setCartProduct(newProducts);props.removeFromCart(product);}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"check",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"checkout",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"shp-cart",children:"Shopping Cart"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("hr",{className:"line"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"cart-products",children:cartProduct.map(product=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CartProduct,{product:product,removeFromCart:removeFromCart});})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"total",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"totalprice",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"subtotal",children:["Subtotal (",cartProduct.length," items) :"," "]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cost",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("small",{className:"small",children:"$"})," ",totalPrice," "]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"gift",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"checkbox"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"This order contains a gift"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"cart-checkout",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"addtocart check-btn",children:"Proceed To Checkout"})})]})]});}
